description: This file defines an AuthProvider class in Dart, which manages user authentication state, interacts with authentication and realtime services, and notifies listeners of changes. It is used within a Flutter app to handle login, registration, and logout functionalities.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages user authentication state, calling external auth and realtime services, and notifying the UI about state changes.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: Constructor with optional dependency injection for auth and realtime services, initializes internal services.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login with email and password, updates state, connects to realtime service, and handles errors.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and optional name, updates state, connects to realtime service, and handles errors.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user, disconnects from realtime service, clears user state, and notifies listeners.
